resources.string: This app was created for the purpose of the course Mobile App Development. If you see this app in the wild, idk what happened. We wrote this app using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose, which is a new UI framework for Android. It\'s pretty cool. We hope you like it! Oh and, we wrote our own API for this app, which you can find here: github.com/Delnegend/covid-api (the data is from the WHO).

Here\'s another paragraph so that our \"About us\" page looks a bit more filled. Because I don\'t want to use Lorem Ipsum. That\'s boring. At this point I\'m just typing random stuff. I hope you\'re having a good day, and a good week. Stay safe!
